title:
$H$-compactness for nonlocal linear operators in fractional divergence
  form
authors: Maicol Caponi, Alessandro Carbotti, Alberto Maione
abstract:
We study the $H$-convergence problem for a class of nonlocal linear operators
in fractional divergence form, where the oscillations of the matrices are
prescribed outside the reference domain. Our compactness argument bypasses the
failure of the classical localisation techniques, that mismatch with the
nonlocal nature of the operators involved. If symmetry is also assumed, we show
that the $H$-compactness can be equivalently obtained through the
$\Gamma$-convergence of the associated energies.
